name: Wraithe (@Wraithe@mastodon.social)
summary:
@stavvers@masto.ai I’ve always loved this quote from Jacob Tobia in their book “Sissy”:

“Thinking about your gender for too long can
be like spelling. If you write out any word and
then look at it for too long-tomato, paucity,
preponderance, disintegrate-the spelling
will start to look funny…So
what if your gender changes tomorrow and
then changes again twelve years from now?…Who you are changes. Humans are messy. Gender is even messier”
